Based on a true story.","popularity":40.157,"poster_path":"/gBH4H8UMFxl139HaLz6lRuvsel8.jpg","release_date":"1963-07-03","title":"The Great Escape","video":false,"vote_average":7.947,"vote_count":2470},{"adult":false,"backdrop_path":null,"genre_ids":[878,27],"id":1182169,"original_language":"en","original_title":"Smoker of the Future","overview":"This anti-smoking public information film has the kind of stylistic sheen often associated with 1980s British advertising, with its sci-fi setting, filtered smoke and gloomy aesthetics clearly inspired by the works of Ridley Scott (although it’s directed by his contemporary, Barry Myers).
